meanings.definition: Antibodies that react with antigens from individuals of the same species.
meanings.sent1: The isoantibodies in his blood matched perfectly with those of his brother.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the isoantibodies to understand how they interact with antigens.
meanings.sent3: The isoantibodies at the party all seemed to get along well.
meanings.sent4: The isoantibodies acted like a close-knit family, always supporting each other.
meanings.sent5: The isoantibodies were like friendly neighbors, always recognizing each other.
